content: You can then use these special Crafting Materials to upgrade the Drink at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a buff to your healing potential and the additional effect. But, as you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Balm.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Balm'.
The content is as follows:
You can then use these special Crafting Materials to upgrade the Drink at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a buff to your healing potential and the additional effect. But, as you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed.
